sentence.text: The glutamatergic hypothesis of schizophrenia lead recently to a first successful mGlu2/3 receptor agonistic drug and is underpinned by significant findings in genes regulating the glutamatergic system (SLC1A6, SLC1A2 GRIN1, GRIN2A, GRIA1, ventricular trabecula myocardium morphogenesis, signal transduction, DTNBP1, DAAO, G72/30, GRM3).
